website_summaries.verdict: The Club steering wheel lock we know and love but with chrome plated locking housing. Laser encrypted keys resist picking, hammering and freon intrusion.
pros: New solid steel hooks add security and work as a visual deterrent
Larger diameter makes it ideal for larger trucks, SUVs and recreational vehicles
Can be installed behind the steering wheel to avoid damage
cons: Some units ship with sticky residue

customer_reviews.title: BAD LOCK!
customer_reviews.text: Broke after 5 uses. The lock will not stay in place it busy closed right out even when it still locked! Don't wate your money
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This Club came packaged really well, but the cylinder ...
customer_reviews.text: This Club came packaged really well, but the cylinder would not lock, and the lock button did not pop out as described. I am returning it and I will buy a steering wheel lock elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Derrell

customer_reviews.title: Best visual deterrent
customer_reviews.text: If you read the instructions you will find it suggests two ways to place it on your steering wheel. I chose the maximum security way: behind your steering wheel, lock facing your gauges. This way it makes it even more difficult to pick the lock or sawing it off. Placing the key in the lock facing away from you is not difficult at all. I sleep better knowing it’s on!
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: Dont like this version at all
customer_reviews.text: Very dissapointed in the red color which is actually washed out orange. Also dont like that when locked and not on my steering wheel the Club continues to slide apart. None of my other clubs come Prt when locked and not on the steering wheel.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Walters

customer_reviews.title: Umm they key would be nice!!
customer_reviews.text: I’d give it an absolute 0 stars... no KEY... ???!... smh
customer_reviews.author: Cathie Aloy

customer_reviews.title: The Clumsy Club
customer_reviews.text: Too clumsy to operate and heavy. I've never used it once but will in case of roadtrips.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Abbey

customer_reviews.title: The vinyl chemicals actually reacted with my steering wheel. ...
customer_reviews.text: The vinyl chemicals actually reacted with my steering wheel. There are actually marks on my steering wheel because the coating came off. This is from the first time I put it on! I can't seem to remove the residue... I wrapped it with tape to prevent further reaction. Such a drag... On the bright side, my car is not stolen yet.
customer_reviews.author: Eddie H.

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work on my car
customer_reviews.text: I have side paddles for increasing/decreasing speed and the back of my steering wheel is contoured vs flat. Does not go on "correctly". I can cram on the very bottom om my steering wheel but not in the "proper" position. Be sure to check your steering wheel shape for obstructions before buying.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy L. Savoy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent security.
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent product. During our coronavirus lockdown someone tried to steal my car (again- they have stolen it four times before successfully). This prevented another occurrence. They tried everything they could to get it off the wheel, including bending the steering wheel almost halfway down. They also stuck some sort of master key for Hondas into the club. The steering wheel will need to be replaced, but they didn’t get my car. You can tell that this made them mad, as they ransacked the car and the battery had been drained. I’m impressed that this is the first product which prevented a theft. Will definitely recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Juilliard grad

customer_reviews.title: like key to be coated with rubber like it used ...
customer_reviews.text: CLUB OK. like key to be coated with rubber like it used to be years ago.
customer_reviews.author: charles schaeffer

customer_reviews.title: Awkward as a billy-club
customer_reviews.text: Haven't had my car stolen in the 1/2 year I've had this. Securing and unsecuring the device has become an autonomic response. Super easy. Except the one time I whacked myself with it as I tried to grab my coffee cup when I dropped it. It really hurt and I didn't succeed in saving my coffee. That was a bad day. Anyway, feels solid.
customer_reviews.author: Kasha

customer_reviews.title: Great Product - Feel Much More Secure Leaving My Truck Unattended Now
customer_reviews.text: The comments by other reviewers caused me some concern about the quality of the Club. However, I am completely satisfied with the one I received. It looks and works great! Recently, there has been a significant increase in vehicle thefts in Anchorage, especially thefts of Chevy products. Apparently the thieves have figured out how to compromise the locking/security systems of the vehicles. I don't live in Anchorage, but visit several times a year. The Club was delivered promptly (just in time for a planned trip) and easy to use on my 2017 Silverado.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie

customer_reviews.title: Looks tough to beat.
customer_reviews.text: The Club, updated with easier locking mechanism, just extend it and it automatically locks at the last click. I don't know, I've seen videos where large bolt cutters can sever this device in half. But there's a good chance the joy riders will see the wheel lock device, and just move on to an easier target. Combine this with other theft deterrents, kill switches, alarm, tracking device, and good insurance. You can't stop a pro thief it's been said. But you can throw some roadblocks in the way.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product to ease anxiety
customer_reviews.text: Bought this product for my father as he travels a lot across various states for leisure. The product allows for assurance of mind. It is easy to use and remove. However, my only con is if the product were to be used in a vehicle without a trunk or open storage area it would be rather bulky. But the assurance of vehicular safety is much higher on the list then annoyance of storage.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah “Bee” Stayton

customer_reviews.title: Good theft deterrant product!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this since August of 2019 on my 2008 Chevy Silverado Duramax truck. It works well and I have not had any issues with it. Just remember, this is a theft DETERRENT device, not a theft prevention device. If a thief really wants your vehicle, they'll saw thru the steering wheel or find a way to defeat this device.
customer_reviews.author: Simply RyGuy

customer_reviews.title: Very Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Bought a new Toyota Camry SE...Already had low jack but to activate costs around 700.00 dollars and still doesn't prevent it from being stolen...so i saw this newer version of the club stronger with laser cut keys...i've used the older version on my old Toyota pickup and it has worked out ok but this is the newer improved version...so i thought I'd give it a try...so easy especially for a woman that doesn't want anything complicated..just slide across the steering wheel and it locks automatically....couldn't be any easier...Go for it!!! You wont be disappointed....I went with the chrome version...Nice..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fast easy installation
customer_reviews.text: I have lived in the lower income areas and from word on the streets is that this will not stop a pro. But it will stop some tweaker or low life punk looking for a fast score. I highly recommend the club and put it on all the time.
customer_reviews.author: TJM Foundation

customer_reviews.title: The club is a must for anyone with a car ...
customer_reviews.text: The club is a must for anyone with a car or a truck. My truck was taken from the front of my house but thankfully the club was on it, They only got to the end of the block and had to leave it. This was my second Club and I wll always have one on any car that i own. A MUST!!!
customer_reviews.author: Onyx

customer_reviews.title: The steering wheel Club 1102 LX is a definite winner!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the locking steering wheel Club 1102 LX very recently as a replacement for a similar high quality manufactured boat club which I had acquired in 1998 for use with my wife's (1998) Ford Expedition and several of our subsequently acquired motor vehicles. The Club 1102 LX has met all of my expectations as being a most worthy replacement for the 1998 boat club, and I recommend it to all without reservation.
customer_reviews.author: Satisfied Customer

customer_reviews.title: I now have peace of mind.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and It makes me sleep a whole lot better at night. I own a vehicle that gets stolen a lot due to poor manufacturer choices so it always made me feel uneasy leaving my vehicle out in a main street but now I feel alot more comfortable knowing this will deter most thieves. It has a great feel to it and I love how it has laser cut keys for extra security. I place mine facing the dashboard to make it harder for anyone to drill a hole through the lock. I have not experienced any smell or melting like others have reported.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos ardon

customer_reviews.title: Pick this one!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son to use on his new truck. He says it is nicer than he expected. The lock mechanism cannot be destroyed and cannot be picked with any kind of tool. It comes with three keys which is very nice to have. I told him keep one on his key ring, keep one in his wallet, and keep one at home.
customer_reviews.author: honestlynow

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This product is super sturdy. It is very strong metal an easy to install and take off. The instructions are easy to follow and simple. The only thing that is worrysome is how it slides so quickly once it’s off of the wheel, I feel like I’m going to pinch my hand or fingers in it if I’m not very careful (although it hasn’t happened)
customer_reviews.author: Heavenleigh

customer_reviews.title: Years of use and still going...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this thing years ago and it is still working. After about the first 3-5 years the key started sticking and I was afraid it would stop unlocking while on my steering wheel but then I sprayed a bit of WD40 in the key hole and it has worked fine for years since. I'm surprised it has lasted as many years as it has. When mine starts to fail I will buy this same one to replace it.
customer_reviews.author: Constant

customer_reviews.title: Great product... so far.
customer_reviews.text: Recently moved and felt the need to get a club. It's very solid and very visible on the steering wheel. It doesn't seem to stay straight across the wheel (wiggle room??) however after watching some YouTube videos it seems that it will do the job reguardless.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: seems sturdy and secure
customer_reviews.text: I had my brand new SUV stolen - apparently key fobs are super easy to hack into with some sort of 'relay' device. I thought alarms and all the security with new cars made them impossible to steal but the weak link is the key fob. So I bought a little faraday bag and one of these Club locks - old technology to the rescue. I will use it and if my car gets stolen this time I will report back....
customer_reviews.author: suebiquitous

customer_reviews.title: came fast and functions fine as designed
customer_reviews.text: Came fast. upon opening the package all the parts worked fine. comes with 3 keys. I added some silicon spray lube to make sure it will continue to have a smooth operation. Feels good solid quality. hopefully will be a good deterrent. Can't give this item more than 4 stars as it has not seen action...
customer_reviews.author: Hartman

customer_reviews.title: ... they ripped out my stereo and video player which sucked. but the truck was still where I parked ...
customer_reviews.text: Just had my expedition burglarized they ripped out my stereo and video player which sucked.but the truck was still where I parked it.had I not had the club on I would not have my vehicle.that club does what it's supposed to do which is to prevent a thief from taking your vehicle.money well spent
customer_reviews.author: P A f

customer_reviews.title: Best Club yet!
customer_reviews.text: Paid more for this, but it's the best Club yet! The lock is much more stout and has an innovative key. I bought a new f150 and the more they 'puter it up, the easier they are to steal...Local LEO's said "buy a club or a pitbull"..so I chose less maintenance. Cheers!
customer_reviews.author: Savy Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Solid, well designed, security.
customer_reviews.text: The Club works as it promises, and over the years they’ve even made it more aesthetically satisfying to the senses: good color (blue) and shape, feels good in your hands, and even the clicking inspires confidence. Just one issue, it was a little sticky opening and closing right out of the package. So I sprayed a little silicone spray on the rod and now it’s smooth as well secure.
customer_reviews.author: MillionMonkeys

customer_reviews.title: Add peace to your mind
customer_reviews.text: This club lock looks beautiful and sturdy. Whenever I go to a strange place I use it to add peace to my mind. Very easy and trustworthy to use. The lock will never freeze as some other reviewers commented on other locks.
customer_reviews.author: K. Lee

customer_reviews.title: Good product. However
customer_reviews.text: Good product. However, even though I have had the original club, I purchased this one because the label had LX on it. For some reason (perhaps because I am dyslexic), I thought it meant XL. Well, it is not; other than its price that is more than its red version it is almost identical to it.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Bijan Gilani

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: This item is a must for anyone living in a city. I put it on the steering wheel each night to protect my car. It is super easy to use. We have had two cars stolen in my neighborhood in the past two weeks. Neither was mine. The club is solid and heavy.
customer_reviews.author: carol

customer_reviews.title: Thief can beat in less than 30 seconds!
customer_reviews.text: Didnt know the reason these went the way of the dodo was because all a thief has to do to circumvent this is use a hacksaw on the steering wheel and in less than 30 sec its off. Your better off with a full wheel lock or, put in a kill switch (which Im going to do...see you tube for help, seems easy enough)
customer_reviews.author: FL_Jeep_Guy

customer_reviews.title: Silver Club looks classy.
customer_reviews.text: I have the silver, looks elegant. My 14yr old club truck broke so had to get a new one. Old club to lock you had to turn the key. This new one you pull it out into place. I like the old way better. This one looks way better. Silver is classy.
customer_reviews.author: Darth

customer_reviews.title: Performs Exactly as Stated
customer_reviews.text: Works great on my new car. The red covering was not sticky or smelly as some reviewers indicated. The key appears very difficult to copy. Added piece of mind when leaving my car.
customer_reviews.author: Jman

customer_reviews.title: Feeling secure with club lock
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to protect my husband car he has to park on street for few days our parking was close for one week we really don’t take risk without club lock my husband love it
customer_reviews.author: seema sony

customer_reviews.title: He likes it.
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my husband to replace his old, cheap wheel lock because that key was about to break. It is much better than his old one and he likes it very much.
customer_reviews.author: KF

customer_reviews.title: Sleep better at night..
customer_reviews.text: I Love this product! I have to say I certainly feel a lot safer with this on my car. There has been car theft on the rise in my area over the last 3 months. And I feel much better that this is on my vehicle Every night.
customer_reviews.author: BootsieBear

customer_reviews.title: Works great and easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: I bought a second unit and it works great. Warranty and theft warranty is not available for certain states. It is a little heavy but shows how durable it is.
customer_reviews.author: Art Dude

customer_reviews.title: Extremely well made and very easy to use
customer_reviews.text: The Club lived up to all my expectations. As a youth I always used one. Later in life the cars I owned I really didn't have a use for one. Now after purchasing a classic, I found myself wanting extra protection. So I searched out The Club. Extremely well made and very easy to use. Updated styling all combined for a win. Very pleased with this purchase. Delivery- standard shipping, it was promised a week to 10 days, it arrived in less than 48hours.....WOW!
customer_reviews.author: Norman Pradia

customer_reviews.title: Heavy Duty
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as gift for my husband for Xmas, for his Ford 150. He is very happy with it. It is heavy duty and he said easy to install. Time will tell if it acts as a deterrent. Would recommend..
customer_reviews.author: Gardengirl

customer_reviews.title: Serves Its Purpose
customer_reviews.text: Number of times car was stolen before purchase: 1 Number of times car was stolen after purchase: 0 I have a 1996 Honda Civic, and apparently the car is easy to steal. Mine was stolen from a park-and-ride while I was at work. They recovered the car in mostly very good shape, so I bought this and I've been using it ever since. If your car is one of many in a big lot, this will hopefully make the thief move on to someone else. Sorry other people at the park-and-ride!
customer_reviews.author: Helius

customer_reviews.title: Nicely machined, looks great, feels very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Have been using this on my Volvo for the past year, mainly for a peace of mind. The chrome finish looks great a year ago and still looks great now. The red on the soft plastic faded a bit, but not a big deal. The construction is solid and ratchet mechanism is still smooth.
customer_reviews.author: Yichao Peng

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy, easy to lock/unlock! Great deterrent. Thus far I am impressed with how solid the Club LX looks. Extra peace of mind when parking vehicle around.
customer_reviews.author: Davide

customer_reviews.title: Peace of mind is priceless
customer_reviews.text: Well no one has tried to steal my truck so I can't say how it performs but it's an extra sense of security ..also if I was a thief and saw two identicle vehicles but one had the club I would go for the other vehicle instead
customer_reviews.author: andrew perry

customer_reviews.title: easy to manipulate
customer_reviews.text: First, let's be realistic by repeating the old adage : "Locks keep honest people honest." But if I was a run-of-the-mill car thief and I saw this on a steering wheel, I'd walk on by to easier pickings. Built well, solid, easy to manipulate, and no issues at all with installing and uninstalling. Keep the two spare keys in a safe place, they cannot be duplicated. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: R. M. Todaro

customer_reviews.title: Thank you!
customer_reviews.text: Accurate description, just as expected. Happy with my purchase. Nothing out of the ordinary, everything is fine. Truck is more secure!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A great deterrent
customer_reviews.text: Someone tried to steal my car at work. Bought this and I think it’s been a great deterrent.
customer_reviews.author: mflick35

customer_reviews.title: The greatest testament is that I replaced the Club model that ...
customer_reviews.text: I had the Ultra Club for over 20 years until one of the keys became stripped and no longer worked. The Club 1100 LX is the current replacement. It is an outstanding deterrent and works perfectly. The greatest testament is that I replaced the Club model that I had with the current version. I highly recommend The Club.
customer_reviews.author: David H.

customer_reviews.title: It's like a second line of defense
customer_reviews.text: I have read that a car immobilizer can be defeated by a determined car thief within 30 minutes. I own a Honda Accord - #1 on the list of the most stolen vehicles in America. So, yeah, I need this. It's like a second line of defense. Heck, maybe even the first one. If a thief look inside and sees the Club, he just may decide to look for an easier target. The only negative is that the metal part gets really hot under the California sun if I don't use a sunshade.
customer_reviews.author: Andre G

customer_reviews.title: Deters thieves
customer_reviews.text: Anything is stealable but it just slows them down and deters them
customer_reviews.author: Birdie Contreras

customer_reviews.title: Blue Club
customer_reviews.text: Works really smooth and the color is really nice, there is a rubber clear coating over the whole thing..Dont know about long term durability as of yet. No sticky feeling on the device at all, happy with the purchase this far
customer_reviews.author: 808State

customer_reviews.title: Well made!
customer_reviews.text: I liked the fact that this Club will last a long time, considering how it is constructed.
customer_reviews.author: R.G.

customer_reviews.title: Great choice, if you use a steering wheel lock
customer_reviews.text: Excellent version of the "Club." It is heavier than the original, built a bit better, and has an "unreproducible key" feature, as well as an autolock feature.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Bradley

customer_reviews.title: Thick heavy duty key
customer_reviews.text: The best club they got . Very heavy material and thicker better key: I had a red club and the key broke in the lock . Had to drill it out .
customer_reviews.author: Ricky Durham

customer_reviews.title: Great security device for your vehicle
customer_reviews.text: I use this awesome security product each and every day on my collector's car
customer_reviews.author: Michael Murphy

customer_reviews.title: It will lock down your vehicle and make it harder for rotten crooks to steal your vehicle.
customer_reviews.text: The club is great. I want my Jeep locked down when I take the top off and the club does that for me. This is my second one. The first one got sold with my previous car.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Lownes

customer_reviews.title: Great deterrent!
customer_reviews.text: Just moved from the country to the city and while I love this neighborhood I keep hearing of car thefts. I wanted a deterrent and this does great. Hasn't been ripped off yet! :) Easy to use and does exactly what I wanted it to.
customer_reviews.author: dakini99

customer_reviews.title: Fits my car like groves. Did not scratch the steering wheel
customer_reviews.text: Effective theft deterrent item. Fits my car like groves. Did not scratch the steering wheel. Very easy to put, easy to remove and pretty as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is an excellent product. Aside from being well built it has ...
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent product. Aside from being well built it has a unique key that is very difficult to copy if at all. My local key shops can't or won't do it. There is no guarantee against car theft but this is a really good deterrent. Two cars have been stolen from me in my lifetime and three is VERY undesirable.
customer_reviews.author: Bricker

customer_reviews.title: love it, it's heavy
customer_reviews.text: love it , it's heavy, looks good been using every day. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: D. Proctor

customer_reviews.title: Strong sturdy lock!
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy. Comes with 3 keys. The blue color on mine looks great. Locks automatically just by pulling both ends apart for a quicker process. And it is lock pick resistant. Overall very well made product!
customer_reviews.author: Sergio

customer_reviews.title: Great Product.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Easy to use, looks nice in the car and keeps my car from being stolen. Super happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: JC PDX

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy Club
customer_reviews.text: A really sturdy club that locks and unlocks smoothly. Pretty heavy and cumbersome at first, but it just takes a week or two to get used to it and make it part of your routine. The clear surface coating is a little sticky or tacky feeling but so far it hasn't melted or collected hair or dust. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: D.J.

customer_reviews.title: Very Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Like it. Easy to install and steamily provides great security.
customer_reviews.author: Peter H

customer_reviews.title: It's actually better than I expected
customer_reviews.text: It's actually better than I expected. It's simple to use and very heavy duty. After having my car broken into and stolen this year I'm a bit more at ease now that I have The Club.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica Lugo

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: Not as good as the ones from before, but it works.
customer_reviews.author: Smokytriscuit

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: While a pro can steal anything they want, hopefully this will prevent an amateur from even making an attempt. It goes on and off easily.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Man

customer_reviews.title: The Club 1100 LX Series Steering Wheel Lock,... Winner International
customer_reviews.text: this is much better that the reviews, it doesn't stink, it's not sticky, and the keys are metal. maybe they upgraded, i love it works as advertised
customer_reviews.author: l84lnup

customer_reviews.title: Helps to keep dirtbags from stealing what you worked hard for!
customer_reviews.text: Some piece of garbage tried to steal my Suburban late at night so the Police recommended I purchase this to help protect myself. So far my Suburban is still in the driveway!
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Visual Deterrent.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this after an attempted break in resulted in a shattered window. Figured that this would at least deter visually from any further attempts on my trusty little car. Remember my parents having these on cars in the past, they must be working if they are still around :) Gotta love the red color!
customer_reviews.author: Patrizia R Fuchs

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: My second Club and am satisfied with the product. Simple, effective deterrent.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Y.Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Heavy-duty, NOT like the cheap knock-offs !
customer_reviews.text: Really Heavy-duty, nice chrome finish, highly visible: says pass this one by, because it's going to take a long time to mess with....
customer_reviews.author: COOL DUDE

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this item!
customer_reviews.text: One of the best items I've purchased on Amazon. Very strong metal. Key slides in and out very smoothly. Adds extra protection against theft.
customer_reviews.author: BJ Williams

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely recommend
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install. Super strong. Don't go a day without having it on in my car
customer_reviews.author: XxAquiredFirexX

customer_reviews.title: Very good product. Delivered 1 day ahead of schedule
customer_reviews.text: 3 cars, 3 clubs. Very good product. Delivered 1 day ahead of schedule.
customer_reviews.author: robert l lysak

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: I like this product, you tell it's made very well very strong it'll work on my van just secure it
customer_reviews.author: joe s.

customer_reviews.title: Car won't be stolen again!!!  Now its protected with THE CLUB!!
customer_reviews.text: My 97 Honda was stolen recently, it was recovered 2 days later. Immediately bought The Club. Need for all older car models as it only takes a screw driver to steal them.
customer_reviews.author: Paula Jean Whalen

customer_reviews.title: Great club to have.
customer_reviews.text: Since, my partner's car got stolen for a few days before the police found it. I decided to bought this club for a peach of mine. I bought two of them one in blue and the other in red.
customer_reviews.author: Wanna B

customer_reviews.title: You can rest peacefully with this Clubs extra security.
customer_reviews.text: Best on the market. Laser keys, Unbreakable lock and can’t be sawed through.
customer_reviews.author: Rick P.

customer_reviews.title: Works great as a theft deterrent
customer_reviews.text: Works great as a theft deterrent. Bought this for the new car. Never have a problem with theft when this is mounted. Far better than annoying car alarms that go off when no one is around.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Boehl

customer_reviews.title: Love it. It's cool.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 1992 Camaro RS. Not sure anyone would want to steal my Camaro, but I feel safe with this. It's cool.
customer_reviews.author: Tali Wu

customer_reviews.title: Just extend and it's locked
customer_reviews.text: Love this club, no problems with it. Easy to install and like the fact that you can lock it without the key, just extend and it's locked.
customer_reviews.author: theodor meyer

customer_reviews.title: Looks great and is heavy-duty in construction
customer_reviews.text: Although a "CLUB" will not eliminate theft by professional thieves this will at least slow them down by a minute or two which may be enough to save your vehicle. Looks great and is heavy-duty in construction.
customer_reviews.author: rsy

customer_reviews.title: Been using one for years it's a great item love it
customer_reviews.text: Been using one for years it's a great item love it. I think it's a great deterrent for the bad boys!
customer_reviews.author: Scott Hogan

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, simple, silver
customer_reviews.text: Feels solid and sturdy. Visible and deters potential scufflaws. Easy to handle, install and remove - smooth operation. Easy to differentiate keys from regular car keys.
customer_reviews.author: Ignacio Dayrit

customer_reviews.title: Easy even for a first timer
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my sons first car. He has no problem using it. Was easy to show him how to work it. Easy to put on and off.
customer_reviews.author: Stephannie

customer_reviews.title: Heavy and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 . One for each vehicle. And we are loving it. Easy to use. Heavy weight.
customer_reviews.author: Shielisse

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Nice product with 3 special keys that cannot be duplicated.
customer_reviews.author: ira

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Heavy duty and easy to use. The rubber over the metal has some stinky and sticky residue on it, but it easily came of with rag and little bit of rubbing alcohol.
customer_reviews.author: hana

customer_reviews.title: Happy Customer.
customer_reviews.text: I sleep more secure at night knowing that this unit provides another level of security around my truck.....Happy Customer.

customer_reviews.title: Keeps my car safe!
customer_reviews.text: This club is easy to put on and sturdy but not too heavy. I feel much safer putting this on my steering wheel and love the bright red color and multiple keys.

customer_reviews.title: Don't know how I lived without it...
customer_reviews.text: Love it.... don't know how I've gone so long without purchasing one. I have had no issues whatsoever, not with the key or lock or anything. I feel much better about parking my truck in iffy places.

customer_reviews.text: This has been a wonderful purchase for me, be sure and watch video on how it should be place on your steering wheel, be sure and turn your wheels also before attaching to steering wheel.

customer_reviews.title: Nice piece of kit
customer_reviews.text: Nice piece of kit , brought this for my Audi Q5 looks good in silver . Tight fit on steering wheel doesn't slide around . Cylinder lock and keys good quality .In general well made and good price recommend this steering lock .

product_meta.title: The Club 1103 LX Series Steering Wheel Lock, Silver
product_meta.description: Color:SilverThe Club 1103 LX Series Steering Wheel Lock features a chrome plated locking housing and a laser encrypted key that resists picking, hammering, and freon. This patented vehicle steering wheel lock is the number one selling mechanical anti-theft device for cars and trucks. The Club brand is synonymous with automotive security. The Club steering wheel lock is highly visible and provides a strong visual deterrent that alerts a potential thief that your car is protected. It is virtually impossible to defeat and time and effort are a thief's enemies. The new and improved solid steel hooks provide even greater security. This product is guaranteed for one year after purchase for up to $2000.00 against the owner's comprehensive insurance deductible (not valid in New York, where it is prohibited by insurance law). As a part of The Club line of quality products, this product is brought to you by Winner International. Winner International is committed to providing products to meet everyday safety and security applications. From steering wheel locks to utility and everyday locks, to other safety necessities, the Club brand name guarantees that you are buying peace of mind. Expect a product manufactured for innovative, quality security and safety created by a team you can trust that's dedicated to serving and building safer communities. Why can you expect this? It is Winner International's mission.
feature_bullets: Features an intense silver metallic color
The Club's patented self-locking feature locks with one pull
High security lock with three laser encrypted keys cannot be duplicated
Resists sawing, prying, hammering, and freon attacks
Universal fit for cars, trucks, vans, and SUVs
